Articles.Content:
TacView is a program that allows a person to visualize a flight path and other data from a CSV or other file type. I *think* a CSV should be somewhat easy to export from KSP and I think if nothing else the ability to view SSTO and other aircraft would be awesome but even regular launches to orbit would be useful. 

I am not sure how the program is on new terrain/smaller planet but I imagine it might be possible though I couldn't find anything in the docs, if nothing else it might be worth contacting their support as they are said to be helpful. 

http://tacview.strasoftware.com/product/about/en/
